title: AI Chat Assistant Application

requirements.text: Build a conversational AI chat interface where users can type messages and receive simulated AI responses. The backend should store conversation history (messages with roles 'user' and 'assistant', timestamps) in stable storage and expose methods to send a message and retrieve conversation history.

quotes: Can you make me an ai

acceptanceCriteria: Backend actor exposes a function to submit a user message and receive a response string
Conversation history is persisted in stable storage as an array of message records with role, content, and timestamp fields
Backend exposes a function to retrieve full conversation history
A basic rule-based or pattern-matching response engine generates contextual replies to common inputs (greetings, questions about topics, etc.)

requirements.text: Create a chat UI with a message thread display, a text input field, and a send button. Messages from the user should appear on the right side and AI responses on the left side. Show a typing indicator while awaiting a response. Allow users to clear the conversation.

quotes: Can you make me an ai

acceptanceCriteria: Chat thread displays all messages in chronological order with user messages right-aligned and AI messages left-aligned
Text input field and send button are visible at the bottom of the screen
A animated typing indicator appears while waiting for the backend response
A 'Clear conversation' button resets the chat history
The message thread auto-scrolls to the latest message

requirements.text: Apply a sleek, futuristic dark-mode visual theme with deep charcoal/near-black backgrounds, neon green or cyan accent colors for AI elements, clean monospaced or sans-serif typography, subtle glowing effects on active components, and a consistent sci-fi aesthetic throughout the UI.
acceptanceCriteria: The app uses a dark background (near-black or deep charcoal) as the primary background color
AI message bubbles and interactive elements use a neon green or cyan accent color
Typography is clean and readable using a modern sans-serif or monospaced font
Subtle glow or gradient effects are applied to active inputs and AI response bubbles
The theme is applied consistently across all pages and components

constraints: No integration with external AI APIs (OpenAI, Anthropic, etc.) â€” all response logic must run on-chain in the Motoko backend
All Motoko logic must remain in a single actor in backend/main.mo
nonGoals: Integration with real LLM or AI model APIs
User authentication or personalized conversation history per user

required: Futuristic glowing AI avatar icon with circuit-board patterns and neon green/cyan color scheme on a dark background (ai-avatar.dim_128x128.png)
